name: AssemblerUPSGrade-SEFork
author: Kingdud, bjerkles
title: Assembler UPSGrade - SE Fork
description: Space Exploration friendly version. Provides Application Specific Integrated Factories to reduce the entity count on megabase maps. Desired output rate is configurable. IE: you can decide to have each building output 10 items per second, or 1000. The recipes/costs/results/size/pollution will all scale accordingly.
